title: League of Legends ripoff - need riot to look into this.

embed.description: Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legend! Choose your favorite heroes and build the perfect team with y...

body:
I watched a video from their channel and it's a blatant League of Legends rip off, the map is exactly the same however some of the champions looks "slightly" different but the splash art is mostly ripoffs, my boyfriend found an ad for it on Play Store and at first he thought it was league until he looked into it some more.

What does the league community think of this?

replies.body:
This type of post is better suited for the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) since H&S is more for technical or gameplay issues that *Porocles* and I address.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hiya! I'm sorry I posted it here, for some weird reason it said I couldn't post it in Misc, it said I needed to be level 7 even though I am level 30 on NA.

Feel free to move it there if possible. :) Also if possible, bring this up to someone who can deal with this sort of thing? Thank you. <3
I'm not able to move your post, but your Boards profile shows you as level 30, so you should be able to post it there now.

it doe snot suprise me, and as with many things that are ripoffs the quality of the work will show itself up.

More than worried for Riot, i am worried for the other players that find themselves to play that. Usually theyend up being sinkholes for money more than anything.

Not sure how I feel about this. On one hand, I can play League now when I am not home, but on the other.. This is definitely a League rip-off. It's fine to have a few things be similar to popular games and what not, but all I see are League mechanics and the rift. O.o
